title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 211.2 - Visible emissions limited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 211.2 - Visible emissions limited

State Regulations

Except as permitted by a specific part of this Subchapter
and for open fires for which a restricted burning permit has been issued, no
person shall cause or allow any air contamination source to emit any material
having an opacity equal to or greater than 20 percent (six minute average)
except for one continuous six-minute period per hour of not more than 57
percent opacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

211.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
